text: Johnny Ray Mayhane, Jr. (born December 9, 1986) is an American professional basketball player who currently plays for the Saint John Mill Rats of the National Basketball League of Canada (NBL). He played college basketball for Tulane. == Collegiate career == Mayhane played college basketball at Tulane University. == Professional career == Mayhane earned All-NBL Canada honors as a Moncton Miracle in the 2013–14 season and was named an All-Star. == References == == External links == *Johnny Mayhane at RealGM *Johnny Mayhane at USBasket.com Category:Living people Category:1986 births Category:Shooting guards Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Mobile, Alabama Category:Tulane Green Wave men's basketball players Category:Moncton Miracles players Category:Island Storm players Category:Saint John Mill Rats players Category:American men's basketball players Category:American expatriate basketball people in Canada Category:Basketball players from Alabama
title: Johnny Mayhane
